name: Triggerun
description:
TRIGGERUN is a combination of mainstream eSports MOBA games with FPS games. The core gameplay involves 5v5, shooting elements, heroes skills, and strategic cooperation.There are four different types of heroes:
  • Offense
  • Defense
  • Tank
  • Support

With up to 25 heroes, 14 maps, and 7 modes, players can experiment with different methods to battle. To win, players need to cooperate with teammates to achieve specific targets in different maps.

CURRENT VERSION - 13 heroes, 8 maps, 5 modes
